body_html:
It would be also great to show the team's project on the team's page. And on the list of teams, too.
I wonder if it will require changing the way we assign projects to teams and the team model.

body:
It would be also great to show the team's project on the team's page. And on the list of teams, too.
I wonder if it will require changing the way we assign projects to teams and the team model.
